checks.name: one_step_transition_sequence
checks.reason: Execution path includes read-only -> validation -> enabled audit evidence with single flag flip semantics.

checks.name: rollback_rehearsal_preserves_stale_payload
checks.reason: Rollback preserves stale warning fields and item payload while forcing interaction_worker.mode back to read-only.

checks.name: write_update_path_is_bounded
checks.reason: Write/update operations are considered active only when enabled mode is persisted and policy sign-off evidence is present.

notes: Write-update smoke verification is deterministic and artifact-backed; any future drift requires a fresh PASS artifact before keep enabled.
